transcript.text: How would you respond here? Select one option and then submit.

contentText.text: If you send the technical drawing and integration instructions as requested, is that an export?

instructionText.text: Select one option and then submit.
Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

optionContent.option: No, not if the person is a Johnson Controls customer
Yes, sending export-controlled technical drawings and integration instructions to a customer in France is an export
Yes, but only if the person is in a restricted country like Iran

correct.text: Sending export-controlled technical information, including product drawings or instructions, to someone in another country is an export that requires authorization in advance.
With that in mind, you should not send the information until you know more about the customer’s identity and location, so that you can determine what authorizations are required to permit the export.

incorrect.text: Sending export-controlled technical information, including product drawings or instructions, to someone in another country is an export that requires authorization in advance.
